PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
content: At SafeHaven, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy outlines our practices concerning the collection, use, and sharing of your data.

We collect personal data such as your location, images you share, and your address for the purpose of providing our services. All personal data is processed in accordance with the UK GDPR and the Data Protection Act 2018.
We do not share your personal data with third parties except as required by law or as necessary for the provision of SafeHaven's services.

You have the right to access, correct, delete, or restrict the processing of your personal data as set out in the UK GDPR. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the details provided in the app.
